p: The acute oral and dermal LD 50 of caraway oil in rats and rabbits were 3.5 and 1.78 mL/kg, respectively. Pure caraway oil had no irritating effects on the backs of hairless mice. Applying 4% caraway oil in petrolatum on 25 human subjects had been no irritating and sensitization reactions effects in a 48 h closed patch test [ 91].
